title: Nuisance may be enjoined, abated
context: ยง145-11 Nuisance may be enjoined, abated. Violation of this chapter is declared a public nuisance and may be enjoined or abated in like manner as other public nuisances. [L 1951, c 74, pt of ยง1; RL 1955, ยง23-11; HRS ยง145-11] Rules of Court Injunction, see HRCP rule 65.
